name: Partner Modes
description: Syngenta demo configurations and ClubCorp presets for partner-specific deployments.

prd.problemStatement: Strategic partners like Syngenta and ClubCorp require customized configurations and branding. Partner modes enable rapid deployment of partner-specific instances.
userStories: As a partner manager, I want Syngenta demos so that I can showcase partner integration
As a partner manager, I want ClubCorp presets so that rollout is streamlined
